titles.title: To promote security and energy partnerships in the Eastern Mediterranean, and for other purposes.
Eastern Mediterranean Security and Energy Partnership Act of 2019
Eastern Mediterranean Security and Energy Partnership Act of 2019
Eastern Mediterranean Security and Energy Partnership Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committees on Financial Services, Oversight and Reform, Ways and Means, and the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committees on Financial Services, Oversight and Reform, Ways and Means, and the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.
